text: way shay' yamnaekum 'ayuha almuslimun min 'an takuluu mimaa dhukir asm allah elyh, waqad byan allah subhanah lakum jmye ma hrram elykm? lkn ma daeat 'iilayh aldarurat bsbb almjaet, mimaa hu muharam ealaykum kalmytt, fa'iinah mbah lkm. w'inn kthyrana min aldaaliyn layudiluwn ean sabil allah ashyaehm fi tahlil alharam watahrim alhlal bahwayhm; jhla mnhm. 'iina rabak -ayha alrswl- hu 'aelam biman tajawuz hdh fi dhlk, wahu aldhy yatawalaa hisabah wjza'h
